title: FAO experts assess risk of antimicrobial resistance spreading via food loss and waste

title: WA government announces $140m plan to prevent repeat of record
desc: Creating more beds and boosting immunisation are key features of a $140 million "winter strategy" aimed at avoiding a repeat of WA's worst-ever flu season.

title: US women’s ice hockey team declines Trump’s State of the Union invitation
desc: Olympics gold medal-winning team has politely turned down a request from President Donald Trump to attend his address.

title: 'Botched' star Jordan James Parke dies at 34, possibly following a cosmetic procedure
desc: He was notorious for undergoing numerous cosmetic surgeries.

title: Stock market crash: TCS, Infosys, Suzlon Energy, Ola Electric among 264 stocks that hit 52-week low on NSE
desc: NIFTY50 and SENSEX are trading with a sharp decline today as investors' sentiments turned negative amid a sell-off in the global markets, rising US-Iran geopolitical tensions and the threat of US trade tariffs.

title: Artificial Intelligence: Africa gov'ts must adopt, adapt, and indigenise, but do not copy and paste
desc: Much of today’s global conversation is shaped by new technologies, including Artificial Intelligence (AI), digital transformation, and social media, and by the impact of these forces on democracy, peace, security, geopolitics, integration, and economic development.
